fn.p: I have read the journal's policy and the authors of the manuscript have the following competing interests: QAtB and TAP receive support from GlaxoSmithKline for unrelated work on dengue vaccine modeling. Philippe Buchy is currently an employee of GlaxoSmithKline vaccines.
